profile.name: Jorge
profile.title: Analista BI en Daimler AG
profile.description:
I am a Business Intelligence analyst and developer that currently works for the Mercedes Benz group.
I have been working in business intelligence for 11 years in different companies and business areas like Telecommunications, Insurances and Automotive industries.

In my free time I enjoy spending time with friends, my girlfriend and family. I also like sports like rugby and basketball but also sports in general.

I am a person who likes the challenges and who is willing to take new projects.

location.notes: Autocompleted using Google Maps API (id: ChIJgTwKgJcpQg0RaSKMYcHeNsQ)

challenges.description:
Development of some process to comunicate a SAP environment with some local applications

Implementación de procesos para interconectar otras aplicaciones en un ordenador local con un entorno SAP

Data modelling and ETL development / Desarrollo de ETL y modelado de datos
Microsoft SQL Server 2008
Microsoft SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)

Experience in Business Intelligence and Datawarehousing projects.
Experience with Microsft SSIS and Microsoft SSAS tools with a Sql Server 2012 environment.

Colaboración en proyectos de Business Intelligence y Datawarhousing usando la herramienta Microsoft SSIS y Microsoft SSAS así como la base de datos SQL SERVER 2012

Experience in Business Intelligence and Datawarehousing projects.
Experience with Microsft SSIS and Microsoft SSAS tools with a Sql Server 2012 environment.

Colaboración en proyectos de Business Intelligence y Datawarhousing usando la herramienta Microsoft SSIS y Microsoft SSAS así como la base de datos SQL SERVER 2012

Development of a process to send signals between a Biopac system and a E-prime one to allow to start data recording in a prefixed time of the experiment

Implementación de una conexión para enviar señales entre un sistema Biopac y otro sistema E-prime para permitir que iniciar la captacion de datos desde Biopac en un determinado instante del experimento generado en E-prime

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription: I like to be involved in new technologies even if they completely unknown to me. My dream job will be something about that when I can investigate and bring use cases for tools and technologies to real projects
